title: New Regulation Requires Motorcycle Owners to Install 75 MPH Governors by January 2017
subtitle: A fake news site started rumors that all American motorcyclists would be required to employ 75 MPH speed governors on their bikes by January 2017.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The U.S. government is instituting a regulation mandating all motorcycles be outfitted with 75 MPH governors by January 2017.
